name: Realm of Gods
description:
Created By Arik Chong

Beautiful environments, fun stories, and relaxing puzzles — Realm of Gods is a world exploration game that invites players to delve into Chinese mythology in a unique and interactive way!  Travel through the different realms of the Chinese gods and goddesses to learn more about them! What secrets do they keep? The world is yours to explore!

This specific prototype explores the story of Chang’e (姮娥), the moon goddess, famous for her dealings with the elixir of immortality. By finding and collecting runestones in the goddesses' realm, players unlock clues to her lore, leading up to a final reveal of Chang'e’s origin story! 

Unity Assests Used:

Simple Low Poly Nature Pack  By NeuronCat

Rock Pack for Environment By Beavy Store

RPG Poly Pack - Lite By Gigel

Simple Forest Pack By Soft Poly Studios

Skybox Extended Shader By BOXOPHOBIC
